snippet: Loko Kalicha Junno says she trekked for a week to save her 10 cattle from dying of thirst and hunger. But none survived. Now, at one of the last watering holes in this remote village, she fears for herself....

headline.main: With a Trail of Smoke, a Leisurely Flight Turned Deadly
headline.print_headline: With a Trail of Smoke, a Leisurely Flight Turned Deadly in the Hamptons

lead_paragraph: Loko Kalicha Junno says she trekked for a week to save her 10 cattle from dying of thirst and hunger. But none survived. Now, at one of the last watering holes in this remote village, she fears for herself.
